Title: How to make an Account?
Content: 1. Click "Create a User (On the top of the screen)" 2.Enter Full Name and Email in the textboxes and press "Create User" Button. 3. A successful message will pop up if it worked

Title: How do I Import a .CSV File?
Content: 1. Click "Create a User (On the top of the screen)" 2. Click "Import .CSV" 3. Choose the file you want to import 4. Click "Validate" 5. Click "Confirm"

Title: How do I Search for Users?
Content: 1. Click "Search in AzureAD (On the top of the screen)" 2. Click the drop down menu or search directly on it
